channel.title: RSS Improvements
channel.description:
I've started using Google Reader again, and one of the feeds I have on my list is this forum's.
I think it would be nice to have some customization options for RSS. On the technical end of things, settings could be retrieved through appending a unique key to the RSS url, for example: [code]https://moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php?type=rss;action=.xml;key=d3b07384d113edec49eaa6238ad5ff00[/code]
The most important thing I would want from this is the ability to have hidden forums that I can see from my account on my feed, so I don't have to log in to check them. Being able to remove certain categories/forums from the feed would be nice as well.

item.title: RSS Improvements
item.dc:creator: @teh_spede Teh Spede
item.description:
@teh_spede wrote:

[quote=“c|p, post:3, topic:435239”][quote author=Teh Spede link=topic=537958.msg3934541#msg3934541 date=1330965560]

I’ve started using Google Reader again, and one of the feeds I have on my list is this forum’s.

I think it would be nice to have some customization options for RSS. On the technical end of things, settings could be retrieved through appending a unique key to the RSS url, for example:

The most important thing I would want from this is the ability to have hidden forums that I can see from my account on my feed, so I don’t have to log in to check them. Being able to remove certain categories/forums from the feed would be nice as well.
[/quote]I had to wget the xml file with my cookie and then read the wgetted xml file to get everything to work when we used to have rss in #mitbrss #gamedev and #mscaperss :F

That’s easily done, but the point is to be able to personalize it like that without workarounds (like using wget with a cookie, Google Reader can’t quite do that).[/quote]My point was that I support the key suggestion because of the way that MITB has done his TOS.

Read full topic

item.title: RSS Improvements
item.dc:creator: @Cheese_Police c|p
item.description:
@Cheese_Police wrote:

[quote=“Teh Spede, post:2, topic:435239”][quote author=c|p link=topic=537958.msg3934535#msg3934535 date=1330964695]
I’ve started using Google Reader again, and one of the feeds I have on my list is this forum’s.

I think it would be nice to have some customization options for RSS. On the technical end of things, settings could be retrieved through appending a unique key to the RSS url, for example:

The most important thing I would want from this is the ability to have hidden forums that I can see from my account on my feed, so I don’t have to log in to check them. Being able to remove certain categories/forums from the feed would be nice as well.
[/quote]I had to wget the xml file with my cookie and then read the wgetted xml file to get everything to work when we used to have rss in #mitbrss #gamedev and #mscaperss :F[/quote]

That’s easily done, but the point is to be able to personalize it like that without workarounds (like using wget with a cookie, Google Reader can’t quite do that).

Read full topic
